title: Client lagging/erroring
body:
Recently I've been getting ridiculous bouts of lag, errors and straight up crashing from the client. Twice in a row just now I got kicked out of Ranked champion select (dodge timers included.), once because I made the horrible mistake of trying to change my ward skin (how very dare I!) which caused the client to, well, just see for yourself:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QRFMSJlv7Qk

And again straight after that champ select it happened again, this time I didn't even ----ing click anything

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wo0fg8DsCY4

I'm going to go out on a limb and say this is because for some ridiculously stupid reason the client still uses Adobe Air in 2015 when making a new client would not be any semblance of difficult, in fact I remember a guy making a working prototype of a new client a few years ago, who got asked by Riot to stop. His name was blue something I think? Edit: Snowl, it was Snowl. I don't know where I got blue from.
